summary: Cardiff City F.C. is a Welsh soccer team playing in the English Championship. Founded in 1899, they changed their name in 1908 and started competing in 1910. The team has played in the top English league for 17 seasons, most recently in 2018-19. They won the FA Cup in 1927, the only non-English team to do so. Cardiff has also reached three other English cup finals but lost. They've won the Welsh Cup 22 times. Known as "The Bluebirds," their home colors are blue and white. Their stadium moved from Ninian Park to Cardiff City Stadium in 2009. They have rivalries with Swansea City and Bristol City.
title: Cardiff City F.C.
